pizza module¶

class pizza.Pizza(crust, sauces, cheese, toppings)¶

Bases: object

A class to represent a single pizza with its toppings and calculate its cost.

Attributes:

crust (str): The type of crust for the pizza. sauces (list): A list of sauces on the pizza. cheese (str): The type of cheese on the pizza. toppings (list): A list of toppings on the pizza. cost (float): The total cost of the pizza.

COST_VARIABLES = {'cheese': {'mozzarella': 0}, 'crust': {'gluten-free': 8, 'thick': 6, 'thin': 5}, 'sauce': {'liv sauce': 5, 'marinara': 2, 'pesto': 3}, 'topping': {'mushrooms': 3, 'pepperoni': 2, 'pineapple': 1}}¶
calculate_cost()¶

Calculates the total cost of the pizza based on its ingredients.
